fields.layer_code: new OpenLayers.Layer.OSM("OpenCycleMap - Cycle", [ 'http://a.tile.opencyclemap.org/cycle/${z}/${x}/${y}.png', 'http://b.tile.opencyclemap.org/cycle/${z}/${x}/${y}.png', 'http://c.tile.opencyclemap.org/cycle/${z}/${x}/${y}.png'], {attribution:"Tiles courtesy of Andy Allan"})
fields.name: OpenCycleMap - Cycle

fields.layer_code: new OpenLayers.Layer.OSM("OpenCycleMap - Transport", [ 'http://a.tile2.opencyclemap.org/transport/${z}/${x}/${y}.png', 'http://b.tile2.opencyclemap.org/transport/${z}/${x}/${y}.png', 'http://c.tile2.opencyclemap.org/transport/${z}/${x}/${y}.png'], {attribution:"Tiles courtesy of Andy Allan"})
fields.name: OpenCycleMap - Transport

fields.layer_code: new OpenLayers.Layer.OSM("OpenCycleMap - Landscape", [ 'http://a.tile3.opencyclemap.org/landscape/${z}/${x}/${y}.png', 'http://b.tile3.opencyclemap.org/landscape/${z}/${x}/${y}.png', 'http://c.tile3.opencyclemap.org/landscape/${z}/${x}/${y}.png'], {attribution:"Tiles courtesy of Andy Allan"})
fields.name: OpenCycleMap - Landscape
